snippet: A ninth-inning rally came up short on a close double play ball by Mark Teixeira that ended the game and dropped the Yankees back into a tie for first place in the A.L. East with the Orioles.
abstract: Baltimore Orioles rally in the ninth inning to beat the New York Yankees, 5-4, and move back into a tie for first place in the AL East.
lead_paragraph: A ninth-inning rally came up short on a close double play ball by Mark Teixeira that ended the game and dropped the Yankees back into a tie for first place in the A.L. East with the Orioles.

headline.seo: Yankees Lose to Orioles and Drop Back Into Tie for A.L. East Lead
headline.main: Yanks Miss a Chance to Distance Themselves
headline.print_headline: Yanks Miss A Chance To Distance Themselves
